info.title: Basin API
info.description: Directus-style API with Role-Based Access Control (RBAC). A powerful, generic API that provides CRUD operations for any database table with comprehensive security, multi-tenancy, and dynamic schema management.

requestBody.description: Collection data (name, description, icon, is_primary, tenant_id)

parameters.name: field_type
parameters.description: Filter by field type (text, integer, boolean, jsonb, timestamp, uuid)

requestBody.description: Field data (name, collection_id, field_type, is_required, is_primary, validation_rules, tenant_id)

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Filter by action (read, create, update, delete)

requestBody.description: User data (email, first_name, last_name, password, role_id, tenant_id)

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort order: ASC or DESC (default: DESC)

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: JSON filter object for advanced filtering

details.example: Table 'invalid_table' does not exist or is not accessible
